location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident at Bushire, to His Highness the Imam of Muscat

physicalDescription.extent: Foliation: This item has two different foliation sequences. The first is part of an original foliation sequence which was applied to the whole volume. It is written in ink and appears at the top left corner of the page. The second foliation number is a small pencil number enclosed in a circle which also appears in the top right (recto) corner only, this is the foliation number that has been used in referencing this item.Condition: The item has suffered slightly from insect damage and is difficult to read in places as small parts of the text are missing.

mods.abstract: The letter praises the Imam's conduct and discusses the matter of payment of duties on the merchandise sent up on the Nussrut Shah.
